channel.title: HCC on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in HCC on Some Title

item.title: Herts County Council is consulting on the proposed additional double yellow lines in Gun Lane and Park Lane.
item.description: Herts County Council is consulting on the proposed additional double yellow lines in Gun Lane and Park Lane. Objections to the proposals should be made in writing to Terry Curtis, Postal Point (CH0242) First Floor, East Link Corridor, County Hall, Pegs Lane, Hertford SG13 8DN or tro.team@hertfordshire.gov.uk by 26 April 2018. You can comment via the website at https://www.hertfordshire.gov.uk/services/highways-roads-and-pavements/changes-to-your-road/traffic-regulation-orders/traffic-regulation-orders.aspx (search for “NH00618” on the page).
